spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room zoning roughly matches (Activity left, Bath/WC central, three bedrooms right), but several spatial placements deviate. Balcony in the 3D appears larger/deeper and more open than the 2D balcony footprint (proportion/extent mismatch). The small hall/circulation node between Bath/WC and bedrooms is simplified and door locations along this junction do not align well with the 2D plan. Window runs are rendered as long continuous bands/sliders where the 2D shows more discrete openings/segments. Bedroom and robe proportions appear altered (especially Bed 3/Bed 4 robe wall lengths).

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary adjacencies are mostly preserved (Bath and WC adjacent; bedrooms grouped), but multiple labeled architectural elements from the plan are not represented: LINEN cupboard, A/C cupboards, and the RECESS near stairs. Balcony boundary conditions (wall/balustrade and partial-height wall notes) are not faithfully modeled. Door embedding is inconsistent with plan intent at the central junction (several doors shifted and/or simplified), reducing fidelity even if the overall partition layout is similar.

furniture_mapping.notes: Bedroom bed placement is broadly plausible but not matched to the 2D symbols/orientations precisely. Activity room and balcony furniture is largely invented relative to the plan (TV unit, sectional/benching, outdoor lounge arrangement). Scale feels visually consistent, but it does not map tightly to the 2D furniture indications.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is clear and coherent; geometry is generally clean. Lighting/materials are serviceable and readable. However, the render leans toward stylized continuous glazing and simplified wall/door detailing, which reduces orthographic/architectural exactness compared to the plan.

detected_errors.description: LINEN cupboard (shown on 2D above Bed 2) is missing/not identifiable in the 3D model.
A/C cupboards/closets shown on the 2D plan are missing/not identifiable in the 3D model.
RECESS area adjacent to the stair zone (labeled on 2D) is not represented in the 3D.
Balcony footprint/extent does not match the 2D plan; 3D balcony reads larger/deeper and more open than specified.
Proportion distortion: balcony and adjacent glazing/wall lengths are not consistent with the 2D dimensions/relative ratios; robe wall lengths also appear altered.
Window placement/segmentation mismatch: 3D uses long continuous window/slider bands where the 2D indicates more discrete window sections and specific openings.
Door placement and swing/orientation at the central hall junction (between Bath/WC and bedrooms) does not match the 2D door positions/swing logic.
Hallucinated interior/exterior elements: TV unit, large lounge seating layout, and balcony furniture arrangement are added without clear correspondence to the 2D plan.
